TopicTitle: KSP crashes constantly when I activate decoupler

Articles.Content: I was landing a rover at Duna and I wanted to activate a decoupler. But everytime I do that, The game freezes for ~5 seconds and then crashes with the error message found here. My rover is made from only stock parts. I am a mac user with Mavericks (10.9.5) and the latest version of KSP on Steam. I have MechJeb, Engineer Redux, and KW Rocketry installed.
